name: Bay Area Women's and Children's Center
description: Bay Area Women’s and Children’s Center (BAWCC) is a multi-faceted resource center in San Francisco’s Tenderloin neighborhood with a purpose to assist families, children, and women in addressing their immediate needs with direct services and to lead local and citywide educational work, advocacy, and planning on issues critical to low-income children and families.
